name: Arrland RUM
description: What is Pirates of the Arrland? Pirates of the Arrland is an innovative game set in a pirate world, developed on the Unity engine. The project combines various types of gameplay, offering a unique experience for players. The game features elements of Multiplayer Online Battle Arena (MOBA), strategy, adventure and sandbox modes. A key aspect of the gameplay is the economy, which is placed in the hands of the players, allowing for dynamic and diverse resource management and the development of the game world.
